item.description:
The NEREIA Welcomes: DAVE DENNIS and his MEMORY WORKSHOP

Discovering Your Memory Power

Your profession demands that you remember a tremendous amount of information.
A simple memory lapse can result in a lost opportunity and/or lost credibility.
Whether you need help remembering names, lists, key business information, or entire presentations, memory training will give you the edge you are looking for.
In 45 minutes, everyone will learn several memory skills they can use immediately to increase their effectiveness while reducing stress, and most importantly, increase sales.

We guarantee this will be one of the best meetings of the year.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association October Meetup
